82.text:
Shelley, FYI. Raetta is working closely with Rita on this project.
Rick and I will be involved as well. If you have any questions,
please let us know. Thanks. Lynn
82.displayed_text:
Shelley, FYI. Raetta is working closely with Rita on this project.
Rick and I will be involved as well. If you have any questions,
please let us know. Thanks. Lynn

530.text: Any more news on next week? Are you still flying in at 10:00 pm. I want to let mom know a little in advance if you want to go to Vero.  I cannot believe Larry Dierker resigned, although he probably would have been fired anyway.  This Saturday is full of great games and of couse I have to work until 2:00, ridiculous.  Later

I cannot believe Larry Dierker resigned, although he probably would have been fired anyway.  This Saturday is full of great games and of couse I have to work until 2:00, ridiculous.  Later

1047.text: PLEASE DISREGARD THIS INFO. WE ARE NO LONGER DOING THE LENDING DEAL FOR FRIDAY AND SATURDAY.
1047.displayed_text: PLEASE DISREGARD THIS INFO. WE ARE NO LONGER DOING THE LENDING DEAL FOR FRIDAY AND SATURDAY.

995.text:
Hey I hear you might be going to DG's Halloween party!!! I will be there
and I think Doug will be there too! Long time no talk! Hope all is well,
we really need to have dinner sometime in the near future!
How are things going at Enron?
xox,
Vera
p.s. I still have your pressure washer.....I will bring it to the party or
just let you know when I drop it off at your house.
995.displayed_text:
Hey I hear you might be going to DG's Halloween party!!! I will be there

we really need to have dinner sometime in the near future!

xox,
Vera
